Address.Address1: Av. Nader 5 Sm 5 Mz 5 Cancun Mexico 77500

Description.Text:
Hotel & Suites Nader is a charming property with peaceful, well-equipped suites featuring useful amenities and comfortable furnishings for a restful visit to the beach destination of Cancun. While staying here you can take advantage of the full range of services available, as well as the property's excellent location close to restaurants and cafes. The suites at Hotel & Suites Nader provide all the services of home, as well as a living area, a dining table, and a full kitchen for your convenience.
A comfortable hotel with spacious suites that have a kitchen, living room and dining room. It is located near the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

*Hotel & Suites Nader is near cafes and restaurants in downtown Cancun
*Near the SRE (Foreign Affairs Office)
*55 yards from Avenida Tulum, the main city avenue
*2 minutes away from the entrance to the Cancun Hotel Zone
*875 yards from the ADO Bus Terminal
*1.5 miles from Malecon Americas shopping center
*1.5 miles from the Malecon Tajamar
